document.full_text: sixty-seven years ago, walter ehlers landed on a normandy, france, beach leading a squad of 12 men on d-day who had no battle experience and had spent their army tours entertaining the troops.
document.title: d-day veterans recall world war two turning point
lines_and_colors: sixty-seven years ago, walter ehlers landed on a normandy, france, beach leading a squad of 12 men on d-day who had no battle experience and had spent their army tours entertaining the troops.
